property.name: activePage
property.label: Active page
property.description: Current page, must be a positive value that is that of the last page at most.

property.name: lastPage
property.label: Last page
property.description: Last page, must be a positive value that is at least that of the active page.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
